section.title: Automatically generate verification QR code for certificates
section.para: In preparation for the deployment of the onCourse Certificate Verification service, Statements of Attainment and Qualifications can now be printed with a unique QR (Quick Response) code and URL verification code.

The Certificate Verification service will allow employers or other RTOs to confirm the certificate was issued to the student named without requiring them phone, or otherwise contact the RTO to request look up of the Certificate number in the register.

This web portal feature is currently in testing and will be deployed shortly. All RTOs wishing to use this portal should check the default location of the QR code on their certificate template and make adjustments as necessary. Certificates can also be printed without QR codes if you do not wish to implement this feature.
